title: We sell the lists you make, not you.
description: Our greatest assets are the quality lists our users make and the community on the platform, and NOT any user's data. We perhaps, shall help you reach the audience who appreciate your work, and engage with them.

title: Content-Targeted Ads, Not User-Targeted
description: We let our advertisers target their ads to content of lists which a user is seeing, than based on user history. If you are reading a list of movies, you will likely see a Netflix ad and not the last item you searched on Amazon.

title: Ask nothing Personal, No Device Permissions
description: We only need your email and a password to create an account for you, anything more you want fill in is up to your wish. We will always keep it secure & give you full control over it.

title: Earn together for the amazing lists you make
description: We shall share the revenue from the viewers of the lists you make, with you. You have the opportunity to monetize your lists either through sharing ad revenue, or by making subscription based lists.
